Maven Sitemap generator plugin
Last Published: 2014-03-29  | Version: 1.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

sitemapxml:gen

Full name:

com.github.s4u.plugins:sitemapxml-maven-plugin:1.0.1-SNAPSHOT:gen

Description:

Generate sitemap.xml for project site.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: site.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
siteOutputDirectory File - Directory where the project sites and report distributions was generated.
Default value is: ${project.reporting.outputDirectory}.
User property is: siteOutputDirectory.
siteUrl String - URL prefix which will be used to build url in sitemap.xml
Default value is: ${project.url}.
User property is: sitemapxml.siteurl.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
includes String[] - Files mask which be used to include its to sitemap.xml
Default is *.html
maxDepth int - Maximum depth for looking for items for sitemap.xml
Default value is: 1.
User property is: sitemapxml.maxdept.

Parameter Details

includes:

Files mask which be used to include its to sitemap.xml
Default is *.html
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Required: No

maxDepth:

Maximum depth for looking for items for sitemap.xml
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • User Property: sitemapxml.maxdept
  • Default: 1

siteOutputDirectory:

Directory where the project sites and report distributions was generated.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: siteOutputDirectory
  • Default: ${project.reporting.outputDirectory}

siteUrl:

URL prefix which will be used to build url in sitemap.xml
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: sitemapxml.siteurl
  • Default: ${project.url}
